channel.title: business on Grzegorz Baranski
channel.description: Recent content in business on Grzegorz Baranski

item.title: My first business
item.description: Back when I was 12 in June 2017, I bought my first iPhone(5s), with a broken screen. My plan was to replace it with cheap aliexpress screens, and make some money. Unfortunately I accidently broke fingerprint reader while dissasembling the phone, and because of that, I’ve sold it cheaper than I bought it, I lost some money, but I gained skills, and I knew that it won’t happen for the next time, so I didn’t gave up.
